Class TaskMessage

java.lang.Object
taskmessaging.util.TaskMessage
public class TaskMessage extends Object
Objects of this class represent one admin task message.

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskMessage

      public TaskMessage(String request, String requester, String sender, String text)
      This is the constructor that should be used for a new task message.
      Parameters:
      request - The request the task message is for.
      requester - The username of the requester for this task message's request.
      sender - The task message's sender.
      text - The task message's text.

    • TaskMessage

      public TaskMessage(int primaryKey, String request, String requester, String sender, String text, boolean requestIsOpen, String timeAndDate)
      This is the constructor used to retrieve task messages from the database.

      Not recommended for use outside of database classes.

      Parameters:
      primaryKey - The integer key used by the database.
      request - The request the task message is for.
      requester - The username of the requester for this task message's request.
      sender - The username of the sender for this task message.
      text - The task message's text.
      requestIsOpen - Is the request open or closed by admin(s)?
      timeAndDate - What time was the message sent?
